doc.title: Trident

value.content: Trident (or MSHTML) was a layout engine that powered Internet Explorer. A Trident fork called EdgeHTML replaced Trident in Internet Explorer's successor, Edge.

value.title: See also
value.content: • Trident layout engine on Wikipedia
